game.name: Aimlabs
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: 궁극의 FPR/TPS 훈련 솔루션: Aim Lab은 최신 퍼포먼스 트래킹 및 분석 방식과 머신 러닝을 융합해 여러분을 더 빠르고 정확한 사수로 만들어 줍니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Aimlabs is the aim trainer of choice for over 40 Million players, from beginners to esports pros. Our unique aim analysis optimizes your gameplay, targets your weaknesses & builds key skills for any FPS game! Time to warm up with our unlimited scenarios & rank up in-game!

reviewHighlights.text: Over 900 hours and I can honestly say it's probably the best tool I know of for improving your aim. I use controller by the way. However I can also sa...
the adds and begging to pay is really annoying, they want a bunch of details and shit about you like im applying for a CC. still it does what it says,...
